archimate:Capability.name: Product Anomaly Lifecycle Management
archimate:Capability.documentation: Product Anomaly Lifecycle Management business process establishes and controls all activities that are involved in overseeing, directing, administering, controlling and organizing the definition, detection/prediction, mitigation and learnings related to Product Anomaly Management. Product Anomaly Lifecycle Management cover the lifecycle activities, including: Establishing “what is normal" for a active product (buy, sell, care) in order to inform “deviations" or aberrations. Orchestrating Product Anomaly Management activities to meet customer and business partner needs. Managing the ability to acquire and apply knowledge and skills from past and present product anomalies. Managing actions that make the best or effective use of Product Management Closed Loops. Monitoring feedback to and from Product Management to support Product Anomaly Management activities. Reporting on Product Anomaly Management Closed Loops.
